```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(sp)
library(maps)
library(mapdata)
library(leaflet)
library(mapview)

# renaming the data frame into something more manageable!
ca_df = X2018_03_13_2021_03_15_Central_America

# the latitude and longitude fields are named "latitude" and "longitude"

mapview(ca_df, xcol = "longitude", ycol = "latitude", zcol = "sub_event_type", 
        crs = 4269,
        legend = TRUE,
        legend.opacity = .5,
        grid = FALSE,
        map.types = c("OpenStreetMap", "Esri.WorldImagery"),
        use.layer.names = TRUE,
        alpha = 0.1,
        alpha.regions = 0.1,
        cex = 3,
        label = ca_df$sub_event_type
        )
```
